name: Swipp! (itch)
description:
Swipe anywhere to move your cubes. Put them in their boxes. Use their environment. And sometimes avoid it.

/ 50 handcrafted levels
/ a couple of mechanics
/ minimal user interface for minimal distraction
/ tiny rolling and jumping cubes

HOW TO PLAY
Use W, A, S, D or the arrow keys to move the cubes around.

Thank you for playing my game!
